page.title: 03FARMING NURSERIES FARMS
page.content: {SAYERS FARM IS AT 2 MILE ASH,HORSHAM. MR.VINCE IS THE FARMER AND HE HAS 57 ACRES OF LAND.HE ONLY HAS 2 TRACTORS BECAUSE IT IS A SMALL FARM.HE HAS 38 COWS AND 15 OF THEM ARE CALVES.HE REARS THE YOUNG FRIESIAN GURNSEY COWS AND SELLS THE OLD COWS.SOME COWS PRODUCE 7 GALLONS OF MILK.HE IS MORE INTERESTED IN COWS THAN CROPS.HE HAS NO CROPS ONLY PASTURE.HE GROWS GOOD GRASS FOR HIS COWS AND USES NO ARTIFICAL FERTILISERS.SAYERS FARM IS THE OLDEST BUILDING IN THE AREA.IT WAS A MEDIEVAL HALL BUILDING BUILT AROUND 1400.THERE ARE 2 OLD BARNS.MR.VINCE WAS BORN INTO FARMNG BUT SAYERS FARM IS OWNED BY SIR AUBURY FLETCHER. MR.VINCE AND HIS WIFE HAVE WORKED THE FARM SINCE 1930.
